cab.content: This Document is ;e Prop^y r.f His Britannic majesty'3 Government(P 3846) Prom Secretary of State to Viceroy, Foreign Department,, ' Uh August 1919. 'Priority A.Foreign Secret, Afghanistan. See Roos-KeppePs telegrams Nos. 1484 and 149.1, serial Nos. 343 and 352 in printed correspondence . enclosed, in your Foreign Secretary's weekly letter 44, dated 4tli June. What were cypher codes left behind at Wan a and captured by enemy? Why were they not destroyed before leaving?
